articles.description: Discovery and OWN's "Where Do We Go From Here?," a two-night special hosted by Oprah Winfrey, will address systemic racism and the ongoing protests.
articles.content:
Oprah Winfrey is hosting a two-part town hall on racism this week with special guests Ava DuVernay, Stacey Abrams, David Oyelowo and others.
